questions: Where is the Vice President of Academic Affairs Office?
Where to locate the Vice President of Academic Affairs Office?
Where to find the Vice President of Academic Affairs Office?
Location of Vice President of Academic Affairs Office
answers: The Vice President of Academic Affairs Office(VPAA) is located at the ground floor of the Don Rodolfo T. Lizares Sr. Building also known as the main building. It is facing the colege library and is located along the Human Resource Department. Here's an image of the Vice President of Academic Affairs Office(VPAA):
